channel.title: Splitify | Project Pitch
channel.description: Recent content on Splitify | Project Pitch

item.title: Splitify | End of Project Sprint Review
item.description: End of Project Sprint Review Advertised Features Splitting of large playlists by track information ✓ Drag ‘n drop inter-playlist track management ✓ Tracks can be grouped for easier bulk edits ✓ Sorting and filtering of playlists ✓ Additional Features Track information (track feature graphical visualisation) Track audio preview (for available tracks) Unused genre hint Timeline Projected Actual Release Roadmap Beta (Week 6) - Application that allows the user to log in, split, sort and filter playlists and sync it back to their account.
